mapper.insert: /* workerPackageMapper.insertWorkPackage */ INSERT INTO public.tb_work_package ( title, "content", work_type, work_status, manage_id, manage_group_id, start_date, end_date, create_id, create_dt ) VALUES( #{title}, #{content}, #{workType}, #{workStatus}, #{manageId}, #{manageGroupId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{createId}, now() )
